column4: okay, well thanks! I will look it up.  in the mean time!!!  the graphics!

it says address already in use

same way as any version
I thought that you added them in the synaptic package manager

my version (6.10 Edgy) is different
from what?
then adapt them. its perfectly simple: just add the aptline to /etc/apt/sources.list

if you want to install it we can. if you want it to work, no. go to the wine support channel

I am having trouble seeing directories that I create from my windows machine on my Samba shared folders
anything beginning with a . is a hidden file in linux
to see them, use ctrl+h for nautilus and thunar :)
what sort of files are they?
elaborate please
can you navigate them through the terminal; did you refresh the filemanager?
